short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides detailed numeric reason codes on myfico.com scoring reports

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The text of Reason Codes on myfico.com is, by default, a "User Friendly" description, rather than the underlying more specific numeric scoring code and description.  This extension adds a display of the numeric Reason Code and correct per-CRA order in addition to the default text, and a downloadable CSV of all codes on the Print View screen.  No data is copied, stored, or transmitted, the numeric codes are just made visible.
